8th August 2017
IEBC
Samburu County
Presiding Officer
The Independent  Electoral  and  Boundaries  Commission (IEBC)  is  an  independent

regulatory  agency  that  was  founded  in  2011  by  the  Constitution  of  Kenya.  The
Commission is responsible for conducting or supervising referenda and elections to any
elective body or office established by the Constitution, and any other elections as
prescribed by an Act of Parliament.
I  worked  as  a  Presiding  Officer  at  Wamba  CCM  primary  School  Station.  My

responsibility was to ensure the election process is conducted in accordance with the
Constitution of Kenya and provisions of the IEBC.
